searchParameters.q: Home and Community Based Services website

organic.title: Home and Community-Based Services Programs
organic.snippet: The HCBS Waiver program recognizes that many individuals at risk of being placed in medical facilities can be cared for in their homes and communities.

organic.title: Home & Community Based Services | Medicaid
organic.snippet: Home and community based services (HCBS) provide opportunities for Medicaid beneficiaries to receive services in their own homes or communities.

organic.title: Home- and Community-Based Services - CMS
organic.snippet: Home- and Community-Based Services (HCBS) are types of person-centered care delivered in the home and community. A variety of health and human services can be ...

organic.title: Home and Community-Based Services for the Developmentally ...
organic.snippet: The Waiver services make it possible for consumers to live in the community instead of an Intermediate Care Facility for the developmentally disabled.

organic.title: Home and Community-Based Services (HCBS) Provisions | Medicaid
organic.snippet: The HCBS provisions of the rule make sweeping changes intended to strengthen necessary safeguards to ensure health and welfare, promote health equity.
